TopicTitle: A ______ stole my car, and now i'm _______.

Articles.Content: A Kerbal stole my car, and now I'm stranded in the Ocean of Storms.
An unknown person stole my car, and now I'm wondering if I had one, and what is he going to do with a bus.
A potato stole my car, and now I'm in the Corporate Sector looking for spacers.

A discussion stole my care, and now i just missed my flight for sleep, and roamed in the street 15 20 minutes with some early eldery back pain, a cig and valium starvation.

Edited July 13, 2019 by WinkAllKerb''
15 20 min + cig

Somebody stole my car (radio), and now I'm just sit in silence

 

Quote if you know what I'm referencing!
Boi after reading the title I thought of a meme that would most certainly get me banned from the forum if I posted it
